entry.title: LED Post Top Light Fixtures 150 Watts, 525W Equal, AC100-277V, Bronze, Dimmable, Waterproof IP65, Outdoor Lamp Post Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 331.48

The 150W post-top or garden light comes with a CCT option of 5700K available as a lightweight, slim, and sleek designed luminaire. Made out of metal this luminaire has a bronze finish. The product provides for a high lumen output of 19,200 lumens that provides high energy-efficiency. A beam angle of 90 degrees and a CRI>80 provides for an intensely bright light that provides for adequate illumination & safety during the night hours. The exterior cover of this fixture is built with rugged aluminum which provides excellent heat dissipation. The product has an internal IP65 driver making it dust and moisture resistant to be conveniently installed in locations with harsh weather conditions. A UL, DLC, certified, luminaire is safe and eco-friendly. This 150W LED post-top light can easily replace a 525W Metal-halide fixture, saving you almost 75% on your utility bills.

entry.title: LED Post Top Pole Lights 100 Watts, 350W Equal, 5700K, AC100-277V, Bronze, IP65 Waterproof, Circular Area Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 272.98

The 100W post-top light sometimes also referred to as garden light, is a lightweight luminaire that comes in a slim and sleek design in metal & bronze finish. The product provides for a high lumen output of about 12,800 lumens providing you with ample brightness for your outdoor areas. A long lifespan with high energy efficiency provides for a superior luminaire. A 90-degree beam angle (Type III lighting) provides for adequate illumination, and a CRI>80 enables objects to reflect their true colors. The exterior of these LED lights is constructed of rugged aluminum which results in excellent heat dissipation. The product’s internal driver is IP65 approved making it dust and moisture resistant. Ideal for locations with harsh weather conditions and outdoor lights. This product is UL, DLC certified, the luminaire is eco-friendly and mercury-free making this product safe and hazard-proof. This 100W LED yard light replaces a metal-halide lighting fixture of 350W, saving almost 75% on your energy bills.

entry.title: LED Post Top Lights, 75 Watts, 265W Equal, 9600LM, 5700K, Garden Light LED, AC100-277V, Bronze, With Photocell Sensor, Waterproof IP65
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 265.18

A 75W post-top/garden light is available as lightweight; in slim and elegant design; in metal; & in a bronze color with a color temperature of 5700K. A high lumen production of 9600 lumens, a long life span, and high energy efficiency is given by the product. For general area lighting across large spaces, a beam angle of 90 degrees and a CRI of > 80 provide artifacts that show their true colors with up to 80 percent accuracy. For excellent heat dissipation, the housing is made of rugged aluminum. The product has an internal IP65 driver to be used easily in areas with harsh weather conditions, making it dust and moisture resistant.
